Header: Polonnaruwa senior citizen encounters wild elephant
Content: A man has been killed in a wild elephant attack in Manampitiya, Polonnaruwa. A wild elephant had charged into the second mile post area in Mannampitiya, Polonnaruwa early Sunday morning. The victim was an eighty-three-year-old resident of the same area. Our correspondent stated that the victim was en route to his residence at the time of the incident.
